definitions.definition: A slightly ovoid , orange-coloured citrus fruit with a rough peel and a sour-sweet taste which is larger than a clementine and sometimes classed as a variety of mandarin orange .
A deep yellowish - orange colour , like that of a tangerine fruit.

main_definition: A slightly ovoid , orange-coloured citrus fruit with a rough peel and a sour-sweet taste which is larger than a clementine and sometimes classed as a variety of mandarin orange .
secondary_definitions: A deep yellowish - orange colour , like that of a tangerine fruit.
